name: Pastel x Pastels
description:
A short and colorful experience designed for whose familiar with games like LSD Dream Emulator, Yume Nikki and etc., as well just people enjoying surreal and dreamy themes.

May or may not contain.

6 scenes, 1 life-changing effect, 1 funny secret, 1 ending.

Controls: Mouse, Left and Right to navigate linear dreams, Escape - quit to Title
Shift/1/Mouse to use effect

Atmospheric soundtrack, best with stereo headphones.
